thread.section_title: The Grosvenor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: helenannharper
title: Perfect location
text:
We had a lovely three night stay at The Grosvenor for a family vacation. The hotel is lovely and the location is perfect for touring all of London's greatest hits. The hotel sits right above Victoria station and is an easy walk to Buckingham Palace and Westminster.
Room Tip: To avoid a walk, ask for a room in the main building rather than in the wings. See more room tips
